long_description:
As the door opens you see massive towers of computers that nearly
touch the ceiling. Your sensors detect that the room is nearly 20
degrees hotter than the rest of the building. There is a loud hum
as all of the servers work to power the technology in the building.
There is one central machine with a monitor and a command prompt.
The only text on the screen is:

$ lsusb?

The servers all around you are in overdrive. The central terminal
reads:

COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
....

The servers all around you are in overdrive. The central terminal
reads:

COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
COME BACK TO ME
....
short_description: You are in a room filled to the ceiling with computers.
name: Server Room
